title: Entregador de Flor - Ao Vivo em Brasília
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Vai lá entregador de flor
lines.translation: Go ahead, flower delivery man!
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Dar assistência pra isso
lines.translation: To provide assistance for that.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Que eu e ela tá chamando de amor
lines.translation: What she and I are calling love.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: E o coração se acostumou
lines.translation: And the heart got used to it.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Que de sete em sete dias
lines.translation: That every seven days
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Eu mando um novo, por que o outro murchou
lines.translation: I'm sending a new one because the other one went bad.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Pra não dar tempo dela me esquecer
lines.translation: So she doesn't have time to forget me.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Toda semana eu mando um buquê
lines.translation: Every week I send a bouquet.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Vou te encher de flor minha flor
lines.translation: I'm going to shower you with flowers, my flower.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Vou te encher de beijos de amor
lines.translation: I'm going to shower you with loving kisses.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Quero ver cê reclamar
lines.translation: I want to see you complain.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Quero ver cê não me amar
lines.translation: I want to see you not love me.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.grammar: Portuguese line; note verb conjugation and nasal vowels in pronunciation.

lines.text: Eu vou
lines.translation: I go
